testcase.classname: Automate the following workflows using the Page Object Model (POM) in the swaglabs web application.
testcase.name: Login to swaglaps application
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the swagLaps application...................................passed When user enters the username "standard_user" amd password "secret_sauce"...passed And user clicks on login button.............................................passed Then verfiy the login activity..............................................passed And add the products in the cart............................................passed
